name: Service
friendlyName: Use PowerShell to manage a service
author: Comerco

inputs.name: ServiceName
inputs.label: Service Name
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The name of a service. Eg : W32Time.
Do not use the display name : Windows Time.

inputs.name: Action
inputs.label: Action for the service
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of the action: Start, Stop

inputs.name: AdminUserName
inputs.label: Login
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Administrator login for the target machine.
Eg: domain\username

inputs.name: AdminPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Password for administrator login for the target machine.
It can accept variable defined in Build/Release definitions as '$(passwordVariable)'.
You may mark variable type as 'secret' to secure it.

inputs.name: MachineName
inputs.label: Machine name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the machine where the schedule task is running.
